# Government Tender Announcement: Special Advisor for Temporary Help Services
### Information for Bidders

#### Background
The Department of National Defense (DND) is seeking a Special Advisor through a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Temporary Help Services under Supply Arrangement EN578-172870. The Special Advisor will provide temporary support services to the DND.

#### Overview
This RFP is open only to those supply arrangement holders who have qualified under Stream 13 - Special Advisor. The list of invited suppliers includes:

* ADGA Group Consultants Inc.
* ADRM Technology Consulting Group Corp.
* Calian Ltd.
* H2 ANALYTICS INC.
* IBISKA Telecom Inc.
* KPMG LLP
* MARKETBRIDGE TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
* Maverin Inc.
* Mindwire Systems Ltd.
* Prologic Systems Ltd.
* Protak Consulting Group Inc.
* QMR Staffing Solutions Incorporated
* S.I. SYSTEMS ULC
* TRM Technologies Inc.
* Veritaaq Technology House Inc.

#### Requirement Description
The Special Advisor will provide temporary support services to the DND. The successful bidder must have a minimum security clearance of Top Secret.

#### Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** CB-6432-78519492
* **Solicitation Number:** S4475624
* **Publication Date:** June 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** June 26, 2023, 14:00:00
* **Notice Type:** RFP against Supply Arrangement

#### Contact Information

* **Name:** CFSG(O-G) Temp Help
* **Email:** cfsgo-gtemporaire@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** (613) 971-7955

#### Attachments
To review the entire RFP, please visit: 
- [English Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6432/s4475624-rfp-%28english-version_1.pdf)
- [French Version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/6432/s4475624--rfp-%28french-version.pdf)
